name: Hero to Zero - LD39 Web Port
name_original: Hero to Zero - LD39 Web Port
description:
Controls: Arrows Z/Y: Jump X: Punch C: Throw

You jump into the tragic role of former super hero who, due to an incident in the past, has fallen from grace. He became a slave to the bottle, in order to forget what happened in the past. But the memories keep flashing through his mind. That one tragic moment where he and Grasshopper... No! He grabs his bottle to take a deep gulp when he realized, he's out of booze. Time to go to the liqour store!
